apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this romantic emoji captures a tender moment with a man and another person sharing a kiss, rendered with Apple's hallmark glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded forms. The light and medium-light skin tones are subtly shaded, reflecting realistic lighting and conveying a sense of warmth and affection. This emoji beautifully symbolizes romantic love, intimacy, and a shared connection, perfect for expressing heartfelt emotions in messages on Apple devices.
